repositories.author: tobeychris
repositories.name: hipchat-room-message-APIv2
repositories.description: This is a simple perl script that will use Hipchat's API v2 to message a room after passing in the room name, authentication token and a message. Also includes features for selecting the colour, notifying the room, passing in an html message, using a proxy and using API v1 should you so choose.
